attributes.action: Foreign aid to tackle live child abuse, trafficking & exploitation of children.
attributes.additional_details: Simplest way to evidence this is to ask people to visit CEOP and testimonials by Jim Gamble. Also viewing the horrific and unimaginable stories on the recent Madeleine McCann documentary which highlights in graphic and chilling detail the extent of these most horrifying of crimes that as we speak are being perpetrated against young and vulnerable children across the UK and the globe. This most evil of crimes requires innovative ideas, funding and support from central government.
attributes.background: Live child abuse, trafficking and exploitation are horrific matters that are not sufficiently funded, nor are they taken seriously enough by central government who pay lip service to this incredibly important blight upon our society affecting the most vulnerable. More needs to be done and NOW.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

There's already a petition about tackling child trafficking, which you might like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250478
